api
Class Oyster2Manager

java.lang.Object
  api.Oyster2Manager

public class Oyster2Manager
extends java.lang.Object

The class Oyster2Manager provides the initial connection to Oyster2 registry, and the means to display results

Version:
0.1, March 2007
Author:
Raul Palma

Constructor Detail

Oyster2Manager

public Oyster2Manager()
Method Detail

newConnection

public static Oyster2Connection newConnection()
Creates a new connection to Oyster2 registry. Initializes the default properties file and the registry factory. Starts an instance of Kaon2 platform.

Returns:
A connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

newConnection

public static Oyster2Connection newConnection(java.lang.String preferencesFilename,
                                              java.lang.String kaon2Filename)
Creates a new connection to Oyster2 registry. Initializes the registry factory and the properties file located at the path passed by the parameters. Starts an instance of Kaon2 platform.

Parameters:
preferencesFilename - the path to the properties file.
kaon2Filename - the path to the kaon2.jar file.
Returns:
a connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

serializeOMV

public static java.lang.String serializeOMV(java.util.Set<OMVOntology> OMVSet)
Return the string representation of a set of OMVOntology objects.

Parameters:
OMVSet - the set of OMVOntology objects.
Returns:
the string representation of the set of OMVOntology objects.

serializeOMVPeer

public static java.lang.String serializeOMVPeer(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,OMVPeer> OMVPeerSet)
Return the string representation of a set of OMVPeer objects.

Parameters:
OMVPeerSet - the map of pairs (peer URI, OMVPeer object).
Returns:
the string representation of the set of OMVPeer objects.

OMV2RDF

public static void OMV2RDF(OMVOntology OMVOnto,
                           java.lang.String filename)
Generates an RDF File from an OMVOntology object

Parameters:
OMVOnto - is a OMVOntology object that we want to convert to a RDF file.
filename - is the name of the file that will be generated.

closeConnection

public static void closeConnection()
Closes the connection to Oyster2 registry. Destroys Kaon2 instance.
